## **Setup**

```{r,warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(tidytext)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
library(tibble)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
# You will need the correct file paths if you don't follow my naming conventions (And remember to add ".." infront of "/texts/" to connect it to parent folder IF it is not already connected):
file_a <- "../texts/A07594__Circle_of_Commerce.txt"
file_b <- "../texts/B14801__Free_Trade.txt"

# Read the raw text files into R
text_a <- read_file(file_a)
text_b <- read_file(file_b)

# Combine into a tibble for tidytext workflows
texts <- tibble(
  doc_title = c("Text A", "Text B"),
  text = c(text_a, text_b)
)

texts
```
